body:
Hey guys, what's up! I recently was working on a Avicus PvP montage. It is finally done and uploaded!
I know there are a few mistakes (If you read the description of the video) you will know.

I'd like to say thank you too 
Dynam0FTW
Bmbrocks321
 for helping me get clips and such!


http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=EdmP_e3TDSw
Please give me your feedback!

title: Finally, 4 days of hard work! Savior!

replies.body: montages aren't meant to be 8 minutes..
replies.body_tagged: montages aren't meant to be 8 minutes..

replies.body: Eh, didn't I say I am not perfect?
replies.body_tagged: Eh, didn't I say I am not perfect?

replies.body:
Dude this is amazing! :D
I'm not a big fan of montages, but this is just something else.. 
The PvP from your side is probably what did it-- you did an amazing job getting all those kills. 
I really love it; thank you for sharing this with me! :D

replies.body: Thank you very much! I am soo happy that you enjoyed it!

replies.body:
worked so hard on this montage, if this reaches a total of 12 likes youll be sure that ill be posting another sick cool one of a kind montage again so would u do me a favour and slap that like button WITH UR FOREHEAD




















talk to me baby
